DataElement.preferredName: Family Medical History Ulcerative Colitis Personal Medical History java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives.  A patients family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions. (NCI)_Chronic inflammation of the colon that produces ulcers in its lining.  This condition is marked by abdominal pain, cramps, and loose discharges of pus, blood, and mucus from the bowel.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives.  A patients family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives. A patient's family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Chronic inflammation of the colon that produces ulcers in its lining.  This condition is marked by abdominal pain, cramps, and loose discharges of pus, blood, and mucus from the bowel.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Concepts.definition: An inflammatory bowel disease involving the mucosal surface of the large intestine and rectum. It may present with an acute or slow onset and follows an intermittent or continuous course. Signs and symptoms include abdominal pain, diarrhea, fever, weight loss, and intestinal hemorrhage.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader
